synopsis: At 3:00 PM today, the center of Severe Tropical Storm "VERBENA" {KOTO} was estimated based on all available data at 255 km Northeast of Pag-asa Island, Kalayaan, Palawan (12.4°N, 116.2°E) with maximum sustained winds of 95 km/h near the center and gustiness of up to 115 km/h. It is moving Westward at 15 km/h. Shear Line affecting the eastern sections of Northern and Central Luzon. Northeast Monsoon affecting the rest of Northern Luzon.
